page.title: 05Law and Order
page.content: OUR POLICE FORCE IS PART OF DYFED _ POWYS POLICE AUTHORITY. NEW RADNOR ONCE HAD A POLICE STATION AND POLICE HOUSE, BUT NOW THE NEAREST POLICE STATION IS SITUATED AT KNIGHTON 9 MILES AWAY.THIS STATION IS ONLY MANNED PART TIME BY A STAFF CONSISTING OF ONE SERGEANT AND 3 CONSTABLES, WHO PATROL THE DISTRICT BY CAR.THE NEAREST STATION THAT IS MANNED 24 HOURS A DAY IS AT NEWTOWN, A JOURNEY OF 28 MILES. PETTY SESSIONS WERE HELD AT NEW RADNOR AT ONE TIME, BUT THEY HAVE NOW AMALGAMATED WITH THOSE AT KNIGHTON AND PRESTEIGNE.ALL CASES ARE NOW HELD AT THE SHIRE HALL, PRESTEIGNE.
